headline.main: El Chapo’s Affection for Actress Is Met With Mockery Online

snippet: In facetious posts on Twitter and other social media sites, some commenters speculated on the intentions of the drug lord Joaquín Guzmán Loera toward the actress Kate del Castillo.
lead_paragraph: In facetious posts on Twitter and other social media sites, some commenters speculated on the intentions of the drug lord Joaquín Guzmán Loera toward the actress Kate del Castillo.
